entry.title: Stopping by Mordor
entry.content:
Whose rings these are, I think I know.
They've all come back to Mordor, though,
Except the Elvish Three—and Mine,
Whose whereabouts I'd like to know!

My flunkies I must reassign
From wonted quotas of rapine
To hunt for bumpkins from the “Shire”
While I, back home, grow saturnine.

Foes slink to Gondor and conspire
As if they didn't fear my ire!
I'll extirpate their sad cabal
In Udûn, and the cracks of fire.

These rings are lovely in my thrall:
One more will be the wherewithal
To rule and bring and find them all
And in the darkness bind them all.

entry.title: You Are Old, Giovanni
entry.summary:
“You are old, Giovanni, the richest of men,
Also old, as I’m forced to repeat,
Since your arch-nemesis is a child of ten,
Whom you never can seem to defeat.”

 “In my youth,” said the villain, “A child of that age
 Beat my pidgey, which still makes me wince:
 And my infamous schemes have been driven by rage
 Against children of ten ever since.”

entry.title: With Apologies to Billy Joel
entry.summary:
She can smell burning cities when people tell lies
Yeah she eats steel nails, shits 'em out galvanized
Now she's not safe for people with nut allergies
And she runs on the cloud, but she's always a woman to me

entry.title: Learning The Alphabet
entry.summary:
A for Paper.

B for Dam.

C for Explosive.

D for a Station.

entry.title: I'm getting vaccinated
entry.summary:
20-20-24 hours to go,
I'm getting vaccinated,
Nothing to do, nowhere to go
Till I get vaccinated

entry.title: Lorax Ipsum
entry.summary: Lorax ipsum gruvvulus thneed amet, snergelly once-ler lerkim, sed do barbaloot tempor gluppitus ut labore et truffula magna aliqua. Ut enim ad grickle-grass veniam, quis miff-muffered ga-zumpco laboris nisi ut cruffulus ex ea schloppity consequat.
